content: Run `echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Code Quality Improvements - Eliminate Duplication\007"` to set terminal title
META: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create shared utilities module (common.rs) with extract_type_name_from_error and extract_single_field_value functions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating common.rs
Create constants module (constants.rs) with TRANSFORM_SEQUENCE_F32_COUNT constant
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating constants.rs
Update transformers/mod.rs to export common and constants modules
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating mod.rs
Update math_type.rs to use shared utilities and constants
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating math_type.rs
Update string_type.rs to use shared utilities
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating string_type.rs
Update tuple_struct.rs to use shared utilities
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating tuple_struct.rs
Update enum_variant.rs to use shared utilities
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating enum_variant.rs
Run `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
Fix any clippy issues following rules: no dead code attributes, no underscore prefixes
Run `cargo +nightly fmt`
Run `cargo nextest run`
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work and prepare for code review phase
Task new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating implementation (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with user
